about_the_game:
Note: This DLC requires the More Colors DLC and The Cenozoic Era base game to play.

DLC Description: Vibrant Eye Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era

Bring your prehistoric creatures to life with the Vibrant Eye Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era. This DLC offers a range of striking, vivid eye colors, from bright yellows to intense reds, making your fauna more unique and visually captivating.

Features:

  • Bold, Bright Eye Colors: Add eye-catching hues like fiery reds, neon greens, and electric blues to your creatures.

  • Enhanced Creature Personality: Make your animals stand out with vibrant eye colors that reflect their unique traits.

  • Improved Visual Impact: Elevate the realism and character of your prehistoric creatures with dynamic, vibrant eyes.

name: The Cenozoic Era - Vibrant Eye Color Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Vibrant Eye Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era adds bold, striking eye colors like bright reds, yellows, and blues to your creatures, making them more unique and visually captivating.
